rooms.description: Sleek entrance area with ample natural light and minimalistic decor, leading to a spacious open-plan living/dining space.

An expansive open area that combines the living room, dining area, and kitchenette. Floor-to-ceiling windows are integrated along the West-facing wall to optimize natural light while ensuring privacy.
Minimalist kitchen with built-in appliances and storage solutions, designed for efficient use of space.
A dedicated workspace optimized for natural light and acoustic privacy, positioned strategically to align with Vastu principles (facing East or North).
A compact gym area fitted with essential workout equipment. Features floor-to-ceiling glass for safety and natural light, yet ensuring privacy.

Spacious master bedroom with built-in storage solutions and ample lighting, designed to maximize comfort while adhering to Vastu principles. Windows are strategically placed to avoid the West side, as per tradition.
Guest bedroom offering flexible space, with minimalistic design and adequate ventilation.

openings.description: Large sliding glass door for seamless transition between indoor and outdoor spaces.
Floor-to-ceiling windows on the West-facing wall, designed to capture optimal sunlight while maintaining energy efficiency.
A dedicated access point to the private swimming pool area, ensuring safety and privacy.

amenities.name: private_swimming_pool
amenities.description: An outdoor private swimming pool designed with minimalist aesthetics and ample space for relaxation. The design ensures that the pool is harmoniously integrated into the landscape while maintaining privacy.
